text.div:
Yellow Fever (Tests for yellow fever virus Nucleic Acid)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    77959-5 Yellow fever virus ns5 gene [Presence] in Cerebral spinal fluid by NAA with non-probe detection
    8057-2 Yellow fever virus RNA [Presence] in Serum by NAA with probe detection
    90459-9 Yellow fever virus RNA [Presence] in Blood by NAA with probe detection
